attributes.action: Compensate the families of Covid-19 emergency workers who have lost their lives.
attributes.additional_details: There is no difference between a firefighter dying in a blazing building attempting to rescue people, and a nurse who contracts and dies from Covid-19, whilst caring for the seriously sick. The families of the latter deserve the compensation of deceased firefighters.
attributes.background: To give compensation to emergency workers’ families when they die during the Covid-19 emergency, similar to existing compensation for the loss of a firefighter.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Fund increased death in service benefits for NHS staff who die during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307592

Provide financial security and compensation to the families of keyworker victims: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315685

Provide pensions to all who lose their husband, wife or partner during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311355
